description: dashboard: better ui layout for subrepo status

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5595048/diff/1002/misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.html
File misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5595048/diff/1002/misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.html#newcode141
misc/dashboard/app/build/ui.html:141: <h2>
A <hr /> or something above here would make the separation clearer. The prev/next/top links makes the visual distinction a little blurred.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0dbc9639d5a9 ***
